  • Constructor Details

    • FileActionThread

      public FileActionThread​(FileAction fa, java.lang.String err, java.util.UUID id)
      Instances a FileActionThread with an error message, this thread won't start
      Parameters:
      fa - FileAction to run in the thread
      err - Error message, if not empty the thread won't start
      id - The identifier of the FileConfiguration
